mapper.select: SELECT SUM(leadsCnt) leadsCnt, SUM(leadsUserCnt) leadsUserCnt, SUM(actualConsume) actualConsume, FORMAT(SUM(leadsCnt),0) qfLeadsCnt, FORMAT(SUM(leadsUserCnt),0) qfLeadsUserCnt, FORMAT(SUM(actualConsume),2) qfActualConsume, bt bt FROM ( SELECT SUM(leads_cnt) leadsCnt, SUM(leads_user_cnt) leadsUserCnt, SUM(actual_consume) actualConsume, bt bt FROM yiche_app_app_leads_channel_day_all WHERE bt = #{date} AND channel_id IN (SELECT channel_id FROM imp_platform_channel WHERE platform_name="易车APP") GROUP BY bt UNION SELECT SUM(leads_cnt) leadsCnt, SUM(leads_user_cnt) leadsUserCnt, SUM(actual_consume) actualConsume, bt bt FROM yiche_quote_app_leads_channel_day_all WHERE bt = #{date} AND channel_id IN (SELECT channel_id FROM imp_platform_channel WHERE platform_name="报价APP") GROUP BY bt UNION SELECT SUM(cluecount) leadsCnt, SUM(clueusercount) leadsUserCnt, SUM(actual_consume) actualConsume, dt bt FROM yiche_pcwap_app_leads_channel_day_all WHERE dt = #{date} AND channel_id IN (SELECT channel_id FROM imp_platform_channel WHERE platform_name="PCWAP") GROUP BY dt ) yiche_sum_day_report GROUP BY bt

SELECT platformName platformName, leadsCnt leadsCnt, leadsUserCnt leadsUserCnt, actualConsume actualConsume, FORMAT(leadsCnt,0) qfLeadsCnt, FORMAT(leadsUserCnt,0) qfLeadsUserCnt, FORMAT(actualConsume,2) qfActualConsume, bt bt FROM ( SELECT "易车APP" platformName, SUM(leads_cnt) leadsCnt, SUM(leads_user_cnt) leadsUserCnt, SUM(actual_consume) actualConsume, bt bt FROM yiche_app_app_leads_channel_day_all WHERE bt = #{date} AND channel_id IN (SELECT channel_id FROM imp_platform_channel WHERE platform_name="易车APP") GROUP BY bt UNION SELECT "报价APP" platformName, SUM(leads_cnt) leadsCnt, SUM(leads_user_cnt) leadsUserCnt, SUM(actual_consume) actualConsume, bt bt FROM yiche_quote_app_leads_channel_day_all WHERE bt = #{date} AND channel_id IN (SELECT channel_id FROM imp_platform_channel WHERE platform_name="报价APP") GROUP BY bt UNION SELECT "PCWAP" platformName, SUM(cluecount) leadsCnt, SUM(clueusercount) leadsUserCnt, SUM(actual_consume) actualConsume, dt bt FROM yiche_pcwap_app_leads_channel_day_all WHERE dt = #{date} AND channel_id IN (SELECT channel_id FROM imp_platform_channel WHERE platform_name="PCWAP") GROUP BY dt ) yiche_platformName_day_report WHERE platformName=#{platformName}

SELECT platformName, channelId, channelName, leadsCnt, leadsUserCnt, actualConsume, bt, newUserCnt, newUserCost, FORMAT(leadsCnt,0) qfLeadsCnt, FORMAT(leadsUserCnt,0) qfLeadsUserCnt, FORMAT(actualConsume,2) qfActualConsume, FORMAT(newUserCnt,0) qfNewUserCnt, FORMAT(newUserCost,2) qfNewUserCost, systemId FROM ( SELECT "易车APP" platformName, a.channel_id channelId, a.channel_name channelName, a.leads_cnt leadsCnt, a.leads_user_cnt leadsUserCnt, a.actual_consume actualConsume, a.bt bt, a.new_user_cnt newUserCnt, a.new_user_cost newUserCost, b.system_id systemId FROM yiche_app_app_leads_channel_day_all a, imp_platform_channel b WHERE a.bt = #{date} AND a.channel_id = b.channel_id AND b.system_id =#{systemId} UNION SELECT "报价APP" platformName, a.channel_id channelId, a.channel_name channelName, a.leads_cnt leadsCnt, a.leads_user_cnt leadsUserCnt, a.actual_consume actualConsume, a.bt bt, a.new_user_cnt newUserCnt, a.new_user_cost newUserCost, b.system_id systemId FROM yiche_quote_app_leads_channel_day_all a, imp_platform_channel b WHERE a.bt = #{date} AND a.channel_id = b.channel_id AND b.system_id =#{systemId} ) yiche_quote_platform WHERE platformName=#{platformName}

SELECT "PCWAP" platformName, a.channel_id channelId, a.channel_name channelName, a.cluecount leadsCnt, a.clueusercount leadsUserCnt, a.actual_consume actualConsume, FORMAT(a.cluecount,0) qfLeadsCnt, FORMAT(a.clueusercount,0) qfLeadsUserCnt, FORMAT(a.actual_consume,2) qfActualConsume, a.dt bt, b.terminal_id terminalId FROM yiche_pcwap_app_leads_channel_day_all a, imp_platform_channel b WHERE a.dt = #{date} AND a.channel_id = b.channel_id AND b.terminal_id =#{terminalId}
